text: 1 flumetasone+clioquinol 0.02%+1% ear drops, 3 drops instilled into the affected ear, twice daily for 7 days [Note 1] @ OR 1 triamcinolone+neomycin+gramicidin+nystatin 0.1%+0.25%+0.025%+100 000 units/mL ear drops, 3 drops instilled into the affected ear, 3 times daily for 3 to 7 days Note 1]. @
